name: Solv Protocol
description: Solv Protocol is an integrated marketplace to create, issue, and trade the next-generation tailor-made financial assets of Web3. Solv-hosted digital assets are powered by the ERC-3525 Semi-Fungible Token Standard (SFT), combining the quantitative attributes of ERC-20 tokens and the descriptive features of NFTs. Solv Protocol provides the first on-chain bond market that bridges TradFi with DeFi, featuring two types of bonds: Bond for Institutions and Bond for DAOs.
